dcterms:creator: D. Arp
M. Spreitzenbarth
dcterms:description: The Drebin dataset contains 5,560 malicious apps and features extracted from 42,333 benign apps, collected before 2013. It is widely used for evaluating malware detection methods.
dcterms:title: Drebin

dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
X. Li
D. Zou
dcterms:description: Malscan is a dataset containing 11,583 malicious apps and 11,613 benign apps, spanning from 2011 to 2018. Apps are labeled using VirusTotal, with a focus on fast market-wide mobile malware scanning.
dcterms:title: Malscan
